functions

Class Printer

  • java.lang.Object
    • functions.Printer

  • public class Printer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Printer class provides functionality to print the contents of a Table in a formatted manner.

    This class ensures that all rows have the same number of cells before printing, filling in empty cells as needed. 

     
 Table table = new Table(new TypeChecker());
 // Populate table with rows and cells
 Printer printer = new Printer(table);
 printer.print();
    Since:
    2024-06-24

    • Method Detail

      • getTable

        public Table getTable()
        Returns the table associated with this printer.
        Returns:
        the table associated with this printer

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the contents of the table in a formatted manner. Each cell value is printed with a fixed width, and rows are printed line by line.
